subtasks: Securely transport pesticides in a truck bed, cargo area.
Check containers for leaks before loading/unloading.
Protect containers from damage during transport.
Keep pesticides in a locked area when possible.
Confirm containers are leak-free prior to loading/unloading.
Transfer pesticides with care to prevent spills or leaks.
Store pesticides in a locked area to prevent access.
Inspect transportation area for safety (e.g., flatbed secure, no sharp objects).
